div.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; background-image: {popResId}

label.style: margin-top: 6px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; font-size: 32px; color: #FFFFFF; align-content: stretch

div.style: display: flex; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 10px; flex-direction: row; align-items: center
width: 68px; height: 68px; position: absolute; align-items: center; justify-content: center; left: 8px; top: 8px

label.style: align-self: center; font-family: AmapNumber-Bold; letter-spacing: -3; font-size: {fontSize}; color: #222222
font-weight: bold; margin-left: 4px; align-self: center; font-size: 34px; color: {intervalColor}
